title: See Dubai for Cheap! Discounted Trips of Up to 50 Percent Off
text:
See Dubai for Cheap! Discounted Trips of Up to 50 Percent Off July 10, 2015 
Dubai skyline. (Photo: Thinkstock) 
The deals: Choose from a plethora of outstanding discounts for tours, hotels, and airfare to Dubai of up to 50 percent off. This includes the following: A three-night stay at a five-star hotel, including airfare, starting at $1,105 per person. A six-night Dubai-Istanbul package including airfare at $500 off. Rooms at the JW Marriott Marquis Dubai for 50 percent off. Discounted flights to Dubai from various cities. 
When you’ll go: each deal has its own applicable dates, though they’re often flexible. 
Why we love it : Dubai has a well-deserved reputation for being a luxury destination, but these deals put it within reach for many travelers. 
What you can do there : Head up to the 148 th -floor Top Sky Lounge at the Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest building; get lost in the Dubai Mall with its 1,200 shops; get an aerial view of the Palm Jumeirah, a manmade island in the shape of a palm tree; go for a scenic cruise. 
How long do these deals last?: Check each deal for their individual expiration dates. 
View the deal 
This deal was provided by Travelzoo.
